version_description:
Routes:
-Route between Stations: User can choose any source and destination stations to view route on a GEO map.
-Route from You: User can find source stations within a specified area and plot a GEO map route to any destination.
-Route from Buildings: User can find source stations near to a specified building and plot a GEO map route to any destination.
-Route to Building: User can plot the GEO map route to a selected building from his current location.
Landmarks:
-Near Stations: User can select a station and area within which to view Landmarks.
-Near Building: User can select a building and area within which to view Landmarks.
-Near My Location: User can view Landmarks around a selected area.
Road Closures:
-Near Stations: User can select a station and area within which to view Road Closures.
-Near Building: User can select a building and area within which to view Road Closures.
-Near My Location: User can view Road Closures around a selected area.
New Look & Feel, Improved Performance, New Features, Customer Account Management, Details on the Metro and Tram Network

This version of app updates on:
Content updates
Term & Conditions
Privacy Policy
